BR.name: Resident Evil® Revelations
BR.description: Desenvolvido para tirar o máximo proveito do Nintendo 3DS, Resident Evil Revelations proporciona uma experiência excepcional do horror, com efeitos visuais que traz à tona o medo. Resident Evil Revelations introduz um novo enredo, locais e personagens da série, incluindo personagens jogáveis e os membros da BSAA Jill Valentine, Chris Redfield e Keith Lumley com seus respectivos parceiros Parker Luciani, Jessica Sherawat e Quint Cetcham. Jill Valentine e seu parceiro da BSAA Parker Luciani são enviados à procura de Chris Redfield, cujo GPS indicava sua última posição a bordo de um transatlântico supostamente abandonado. O perigo se esconde em cada canto enquanto eles exploram o espaço confinado do navio, ameaçados por um novo vírus inimigo: o T-Abyss. Em um novo modo para a série, o modo Raid irá oferecer aos jogadores uma experiência diferente além da história principal da campanha em solo ou co-op play.

CA.name: Resident Evil® Revelations
CA.description: Built from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS system's features, Resident Evil Revelations delivers an exceptional survival horror experience with outstanding visuals that bring the fear to life. Resident Evil Revelations introduces a brand new storyline, locations and characters to the series, including playable characters and BSAA members Jill Valentine, Chris Redfield and Keith Lumley with their partners Parker Luciani, Jessica Sherawat and Quint Cetcham. Jill Valentine and BSAA partner Parker Luciani have been sent to search for Chris Redfield, whose last known GPS data positions him as being onboard a supposedly abandoned cruise ship. Danger hides around every corner as they explore the confined space of the ship and face a menacing new enemy and virus: the T-Abyss. In a brand new mode for the series, Raid Mode will offer players a different kind of experience separate to the main campaign story in either solo or co-op play.

MX.name: Resident Evil® Revelations
MX.description: Construido desde cero para tomar ventaja de las características del Nintendo 3DS, Resident Evil Revelations ofrece una experiencia excepcional de terror y supervivencia con imágenes excepcionales que le dan miedo a la vida. Resident Evil Revelations introduce una nueva historia, lugares y personajes de la serie, incluyendo personajes y miembros de BSAA Jill Valentine, Chris Redfield y Keith Lumley con sus compañeros Parker Luciani, Jessica Sherawat y Quint Cetcham. Jill Valentine y Parker Luciani, su compañero de BSAA, han sido enviados en la búsqueda de Chris Redfield, cuyo último dato de GPS lo ubica abordo de un crucero supuestamente abandonado. El peligro se esconde detrás de cada esquina a medida que ellos exploran el reducido espacio del barco y enfrentan un nuevo y amenazador enemigo y virus: el T-Abyss. En un modo completamente nuevo de la serie, el modo Raid ofrecerá a los jugadores un tipo diferente de experiencia por separado a la historia principal de la campaña, ya sea en solitario o el juego co-op.

US.name: Resident Evil® Revelations
US.description: Built from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS system's features, Resident Evil Revelations delivers an exceptional survival horror experience with outstanding visuals that bring the fear to life. Resident Evil Revelations introduces a brand new storyline, locations and characters to the series, including playable characters and BSAA members Jill Valentine, Chris Redfield and Keith Lumley with their partners Parker Luciani, Jessica Sherawat and Quint Cetcham. Jill Valentine and BSAA partner Parker Luciani have been sent to search for Chris Redfield, whose last known GPS data positions him as being onboard a supposedly abandoned cruise ship. Danger hides around every corner as they explore the confined space of the ship and face a menacing new enemy and virus: the T-Abyss. In a brand new mode for the series, Raid Mode will offer players a different kind of experience separate to the main campaign story in either solo or co-op play.
